meanings.definition: Relating to the collection and study of postage stamps.
meanings.sent1: The philatelic club held a meeting to discuss rare stamps.
meanings.sent2: Her philatelic hobby led her to discover unique stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The philatelic expert could spot a valuable stamp from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: His philatelic knowledge was as vast as a stamp collection itself.
meanings.sent5: The philatelic exhibition showcased stamps of all shapes and sizes.

meanings.definition: A person who collects or studies postage stamps.
meanings.sent1: The philatelic shared stories of finding rare stamps at flea markets.
meanings.sent2: As a philatelic, he spent hours organizing his stamp collection.
meanings.sent3: The philatelic joked that stamps were his tiny, colorful friends.
meanings.sent4: She was a philatelic in a world of digital communication.
meanings.sent5: The philatelic's passion for stamps was contagious among friends.
